contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|stroke}} A '''[[stroke]]''' is a cerebral accident, when blood supply to a part of the brain is suddenly interrupted. (As a "[[heart stroke]]", it refers usually to [[myocardial infarction]].) {{TOC right}} '''Stroke''' may also refer to: ==Entertainment & Media== * [[Stroke (journal)|''Stroke'' (journal)]], a cardiology journal * [[The Stroke (wrestling maneuver)]] * "[[The Stroke]]", a 1981 song by Billy Squier * [[The Strokes]], a rock band ==Writing== * [[Bar (diacritic)]] * [[Stroke (CJK character)]], part of a Chinese character * Stroke, a trace of ink in [[handwriting]] * Stroke, a line that makes up part or all of a letter in [[typeface anatomy]] * [[Slash (punctuation)]], the typographical character ==Sport== * [[Stroke (rowing)]], various meanings in the sport of rowing * [[Stroke play]], a scoring system used in golf * [[Swimming stroke]], a swimming style * Stroke, a [[Doing It Right]] scuba diver not following the rules ==Other== * [[Stroke (engine)]], a single action of some engines * Stroke, the recognition, attention or responsiveness that one person gives another in [[transactional analysis]] ==See also== * [[Stroke 9]], a rock band * [[Stroke City]], a nickname for Derry, Northern Ireland * [[Sunstroke]], a condition caused by overexposure to the sun * [[Stroke (Fast One)]], a deception {{disambig}}
